roleset.name: on a vessel/vehicle
roleset.note: ONBOARD-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SHARP (from onboard.01-j)

example.name: onboard-j
example.text: I am onboard the Braemar, heading to the Dominican Republic.

roleset.name: in support of, going along with
roleset.note: ONBOARD-J NOTES: Added by Julia for unification

role.descr: onboard with what, in support of

example.name: onboard-j
example.text: I am onboard with Toddlers and Panda Bears.
example.note: Notice how the argument for "toddlers and Panda Bears" would be completely different if this were the vessel sense.

example.text: I am onboard the Kei Nishikori bandwagon.
example.note: metaphorical example mirrors the .01 roleset, but means the .02 roleset
